metadata.description: Claude Code plugin marketplace: 7 plugins, 21 commands, 5 skills, 9 agents. Multi-agent orchestration, cognitive amplification, OpenTelemetry docs, and .NET build enforcement.

plugins.name: metacognitive-guard
plugins.description: Cognitive amplification stack: epistemic hooks, competitive review, commit integrity checks, CI verification scripts, and deep-thinking agents.

plugins.name: otelwiki
plugins.description: OpenTelemetry documentation with auto-sync. Semantic conventions, collector config, .NET instrumentation.

plugins.name: dotnet-architecture-lint
plugins.description: Enforces .NET build patterns: Version.props symlinks, CPM, and single-owner imports. Prevents AI agents from breaking centralized version management.

plugins.name: hookify
plugins.description: User-configurable hooks from .local.md files. Define blocking and warning rules for Bash commands, file edits, and session events.

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Guided feature development with specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, code review, and quality assurance.

plugins.name: ancplua-project-routing
plugins.description: Auto-routes to specialist agents, commands, and skills based on current project. Injects cross-repo dependency graph for the ancplua .NET ecosystem.

plugins.name: exodia
plugins.description: Multi-agent workflow orchestration (8 commands + 2 skills: eight-gates, hades): fix, turbo-fix, fix-pipeline, tournament, mega-swarm, deep-think, batch-implement, red-blue-review.
